ingredients.item: 200g Waitrose Duchy Organic Brown Basmati Rice
4 Waitrose British Blacktail Medium Free Range Eggs
2 tbsp medium curry paste, eg Patakâ€™s Jalfrezi

instructions.step: Blanch the cauliflower in boiling water for 5 minutes. Lift out and drain on kitchen paper. Add the rice to the water and cook gently for 20 minutes until tender. In a separate pan, lower the eggs into gently simmering water and cook for 7 minutes, drain.

Heat half the oil in a frying pan and fry the onions and leaves for 6-8 minutes. Remove and keep warm. Add the remaining oil and the cauliflower to the pan and cook for 5 minutes, stirring until starting to colour. Lightly drain the rice and add to the pan with the paste, cardamom and peas. Grate in the coconut and cook for 3-5 minutes.
Shell the eggs and roughly break them up in a bowl. Spoon the kedgeree onto serving plates and top with the eggs, onions and curry leaves to serve.
